page.title: 05Thurlow Estates,Gt.Thurlow
page.content: The 13,000 acres of Thurlow Estate are owned by Ronald A.Vestey,who bought it in 1942. It comprises farms woods,hunt kennels,and the villages of Great and Little Thurlow.Mr. Vestey lives at Thurlow Hall,which is a mid-Georgian house with beautiful gardens of 16 acres which were laid out in 1946 by Major Vernon Charles.........When Mrs.Florence Vestey died in 1973, a lake was dug in her memory.It has a monument to her on the island in the middle.Fishing competitions are sometimes held here.Four gardeners look after the gardens,which are open to the public for charity several times a year. Mr.Vestey has also given a sports ground to the people of Thurlow and helped to refurbish the church.
